content.question: The first two parts of the preamble best support which of the following conclusions about the French Revolutionâ€™s goals?

choices.label: The revolutionaries sought to create an Enlightened absolutist monarchy.
The revolutionaries were advocates of religious toleration.
The revolutionaries sought to spread their ideas to other European nations.
The revolutionaries wanted to transform the traditional political order.

content.answer: The revolutionaries wanted to transform the traditional political order.

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
